description: Second year student, and the swimming team`s manager. He had a traumatic experience involving a creature he describes as a mermaid during his childhood, and after which he has been afraid of swimming ever since. However this scenario started to change after Amuro`s arrival at Umishou. Always in trouble due to Amuro`s unpredictable behaviour, he usually denies his growing feelings for her.
name: Okiura Kaname
